invalidReplacer@proto: 'replacer' argument must be of type function, value: {{-value,valueType}}
invalidProtoAction@proto: 'option.protoAction' argument must be one of 'error', 'ignore', 'preserve' or undefined, value: {{-value,valueType}}
invalidProtoAction@hades: ~[option.protoAction] argument must be one of ~{'error'}, ~{'ignore'}, ~{'preserve'} or ~{undefined}, ~[value] {{-value,valueType@hades}}
invalidConstructorAction@proto: 'option.constructorAction' argument must be one of 'error', 'ignore', 'preserve' or undefined, value: {{-value,valueType}}
invalidConstructorAction@hades: ~[option.constructorAction] argument must be one of ~{'error'}, ~{'ignore'}, ~{'preserve'} or ~{undefined}, ~[value] {{-value,valueType@hades}}

errorSyntax.unexpectedChar@proto: syntax error, expected char '{{charExpected}}' instead of '{{char}}', index: {{index}}
errorSyntax.unexpectedChar@hades: syntax error, expected ~[char] {{charExpected,value@hades}} instead of {{char,value@hades}}, index {{index,value@hades}}
errorSyntax.containForbiddenPrototype@proto: object contains forbidden prototype property '{{key}}', index: {{index}}
errorSyntax.containForbiddenConstructor@proto: object contains forbidden constructor property '{{key}}', index: {{index}}
